name: \\ EVE //
description:
An unusual request sends a desperate thief through a storm to find a cure for his sick sister.

----------------------------------------------

A small game for New Brunswick game jam, 2016.

Keyboard controls:

  • z = confirm
  • x = cancel
  • F4 = fullscreen
  • Shift = dash

Jam games here: NB Game Jam submissions

Hosted by: Fring Frang
